name: brd resimulation device
description:
FAQ

Q1: What is BRD?

    brd is an android low-poly game where you simulate flight of a bird.

Q2: How can I control it?

    use touch gesture to direct it, and acceleromter ,i.e. tilting your phone, to direct your camera.

Q3: can I invert the camera?

    Yes, from the upper right icon, you can even disable it.

Enjoy :)
